pages.text: Ware wa, kare-ra ga,`kare (muhanmado) ni oshieru no wa, tada no ningendearu.' To iu no o shitte iru. Daga kare-ra no tayoru mono no kotoba wa, gaikoku-godearuga, kore wa junsui meikakuna Arabia-godearu
Hontoni arra no shirushi o shinjinai mono wa, arra wa kore o onmichibiki ni nara renai. Kare-ra ni wa itamashi chobatsu ga arou
Arra no shirushi o shinjinai mono wa, tada uso o netsuzo suru mono de, kare-ra koso kyogen no todearu

Arra o shinko shita nochi, shinko o kyohi suru mono. Tadashi kokoro ni shinko o kenji shi, anshin taigo shite iru mono de kyohaku sa reta mono no baai wa betsudearu. Fushin o arawashite manzoku suru mono, kare-ra ni wa arra no gekido ga kudari, kibishi chobatsu ga arou
Kore wa kare-ra ga, raise yori mo gense no seikatsu o aishite iru tame de, arra wa shinko o kyohi suru min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
Korera no mono wa, arra ga sono kokoro ya chokaku ya kansatsu-ryoku o fuji rareta mono de, korera no mono koso mutonjakuna ningendearu
Utagai mo naku kare-ra wa, raise ni okeru shippai-shadearu
Shikashi, shiren o uketa nochi ni iju shita mono, sorekara funto doryoku shi, mata yoku taeshinonda mono ni taishi, anata no omo wa, sonogo wa hontoni kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
